---
title: "How to Contribute"
---

Thank you for your interest in contributing to the County Health Open Source Project!

## Ways to Contribute

-   Add or update [measure calculations](https://github.com/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/county_health_measure_calculations)\
-   Improve documentation\
-   Report issues or bugs
    -   File an issue in the countyhealthR package
    -   File an issue in the snapshot app \
-   Build educational or visualization tools\
-   Use our [historical data archive](https://zenodo.org/communities/countyhealthrankingsandroadmaps/records?q=&l=list&p=1&s=10&sort=newest) to advocate for health equity and tell us how you're using it via the [show and tell part of our discussion forum](https://github.com/orgs/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/discussions/new?category=show-and-tell)

## Getting Started

1.  Fork the GitHub repository\
2.  Create a feature branch\
3.  Run the calculation scripts locally\
4.  Submit a pull request

## Questions?

Join our [discussion forum](https://github.com/orgs/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/discussions/new?category=q-a).
